(noun) a feeling of linking for a person: (verb) to connect someone or something in your mind with someone or something else
(noun) a close connection joining two or more people
(noun) a small group of people who spend their time together and do not welcome other people into that group
(verb) to tel something secret or personal to someone who you trust not to tell anyone else
(adj) limited to only one person or group of people // expensive and only for people who are rich or of a high social class
(verb) to change, especially continuously and between one level or thing and another
(noun) agreement between and support for the members of a group, especially political group
(adj) agreeagble and ready to do something
